What else is included?
We don't just provide basic VPS plans here at hostworld, we provide you with robust, feature rich virtual private servers as well as:

Instant Activation - place an order with us and have the server up and running within minutes.
Choice of Operating Systems - select from CentOS, Ubuntu, Debian, Fedora and Webuzo.

Custom ISO - upload your own ISO.
Pre-install a Control Panel - have one of the leading control panels installed automatically upon ordering your VPS. Select from cPanel, Plesk, Webmin, Interworx, ISPConfig or CentOS Web Panel (subject to OS compatibility).

Automatic Backups - we provide a weekly backup of your VPS server as standard (unless you opt out), and retain 3 of these backups at all times. You can even upgrade this to daily backups.
24/7 Expert Support - we're here when you need us every day of the year, every step of the way. We'll always try and help you out of a sticky situation.

Free DDoS Protection (UK) - we don't make you pay for the luxury of DDoS protection. The network we utilise is protected by the world's leading manufacturer of DDoS and cyber threat services as standard.
Powered by KVM - all our servers utilise the latest available KVM virtualisation technology.
Industry leading Control Panel - we provide a self-service control panel within our portal, putting you in full control of your VPS.

Tailor your VPS - customise your VPS package to suit your needs. Add some extra storage, maybe a little more RAM too and go all out and increase the number of CPU cores. It's totally up to you.
Upgrade & Downgrade at any time - we like to keep things simple; so you can regrade your VPS package at any time.

No Contracts - we don't believe in contracting you into a service and are confident that our VPS hosting service speaks for itself. We provide a no contracts service with no setup fees, giving you peace of mind and flexibility.
